fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An interview with Jamie Oliver said that the chef was turning his remaining restaurant business into an ethical “B Corporation”. In fact this applies to the whole of the Jamie Oliver Group, not just the restaurant side (Still cooking up a storm, 3 August, page 6, G2). • An article (Witnessing of wills by video to be deemed legal during pandemic, 25 July, page 25) should have made clear that it referred to England and Wales only. • Other recently amended articles include: Rachel Roddy’s recipe for fried chicken sandwiches Fabio Jakobsen to be woken from induced coma after Tour of Poland crash Pete Hamill, celebrated New York newspaper columnist, dies aged 85
